sentences.en: Cars cause pollution, both smog and acid rain.
sentences.cn: 汽车造成的污染既有烟雾也有酸雨。

sentences.en: Energy consumption, congestion and pollution have increased.
sentences.cn: 能源消耗、交通堵塞以及污染状况愈加严重。

sentences.en: Environmentally-conscious Germans are worried about the pollution the car produces.
sentences.cn: 关注环境的德国人对汽车造成的污染十分担心。

sentences.en: Old buses are major contributors to pollution in British cities.
sentences.cn: 破旧的公交车是造成英国城市污染的主要因素。

sentences.en: Randolph's work was exclusively concerned with the effects of pollution on health.
sentences.cn: 伦道夫的著作专门论述污染对健康的影响。

sentences.en: Stationary cars in traffic jams cause a great deal of pollution.
sentences.cn: 交通堵塞中静止不动的汽车产生了大量污染。

sentences.en: Supplies are under increasing threat from overuse and pollution.
sentences.cn: 由于滥用和污染，供应正受到日益严重的威胁。

sentences.en: The air pollution exceeds most acceptable levels by 10 times or more.
sentences.cn: 大气污染程度超出了普遍认可的标准10倍或更多。

sentences.en: The pollution has already turned vast areas into a wasteland.
sentences.cn: 污染已经使大片地区沦为不毛之地。

sentences.en: The snowcoach concept in Yellowstone provides low-impact, low-pollution access.
sentences.cn: 在黄石公园里使用雪车这一想法，为人们提供了一种对环境低影响、低污染的游览方式。

sentences.en: They say gas guzzlers are contributing to air pollution.
sentences.cn: 他们说高耗油汽车是造成空气污染的原因之一。
